# CapturedRoom.Surface.Curve

**Structure**

An object that represents a single curve of a surface.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Curve
```

## Overview

Each [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoom/Surface] instance in a captured room’s surface arrays ([doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoom/doors], [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoom/openings], [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoom/walls], and [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoom/windows]) that models a curved real-world surface contains an optional property ([doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoom/Surface/curve-swift.property]) of this type.

## Measuring a curve

- **startAngle**: An angle that begins the curve.
- **endAngle**: The angle at the end of the curve.
- **radius**: The radius of the curve.

## Instance Properties

- **center**: Center of the curve, in local coordinates. Corresponds to xz center coordinates

## Shaping a surface

- **completedEdges**: An array of edges that outline the surface.
- **CapturedRoom.Surface.Edge**: An object that represents a single edge of a surface.
- **curve**: An object that represents the curve of a surface.
- **polygonCorners**: A 2D polygon that represents nonuniform wall heights and floor shapes.

## Conforms To
